title: Can Trump deport visa holders over speech? Federal judge to soon decide
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge William Young, who previously blocked the administration's termination of NIH grants, presided over the two-week nonjury trial.

title: 'Flood' of ICE agents coming to Democrat-run cities, White House warns
shortDescription: Migrant-rights groups worry that harsher enforcement will lead to more civil rights violations and prompt community pushback.

title: Trump's quest for Republican majority runs through Texas
shortDescription: At Trump's urging, Texas Gov. Greg Abbott has requested lawmakers potentially redraw the state's electoral map. Opponents warn it could backfire.

title: Hunter Biden says Joe Biden was taking Ambien before disastrous debate
shortDescription: Hunter Biden said his dad's use of Ambien contributed to Joe Biden's poor debate performance against Donald Trump in the 2024 presidential campaign.

title: Trump shares fake-AI video of Obama being arrested to Truth Social
shortDescription: President Donald Trump posted an AI-created fake video of former President Barack Obama being arrested in the Oval Office, wearing an orange jumpsuit.

title: Judge who faced Republican impeachment calls to handle DOJ Epstein ask
shortDescription: A judge who faced Republican impeachment calls has been assigned to handle the Trump DOJ's request to release testimony tied to Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Harvard, Trump administration face off in court over canceled funding
shortDescription: Harvard University urged a federal judge on Monday to order President Donald Trump's administration to restore about $2.5 billion in funding.

title: Judge reverses Trump cut to attorneys for mentally ill detainees
shortDescription: A U.S. district court judge reversed Trump administration cut to an attorney program aimed at helping detainees ruled mentally incompetent.

title: Nobel laureates urge diplomacy to prevent nuclear war | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: Support for President Donald Trump's immigration policies fell in a new poll. | Israeli fire killed 67 people seeking aid in Gaza.

title: False TikTok rumor claims Trump has four days to live: What to know
shortDescription: Multiple videos on TikTok claim Trump only has 4 days left to live, but it isn't true. His recent health update revealed 'benign and common' condition

title: Gov. DeSantis calls on Trump admin to release Epstein files
shortDescription: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis called on the Trump administration to release all the files related to convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Can Trump calm MAGA's fury by releasing more Epstein records?
shortDescription: Plus: Trump sued the Wall Street Journal Friday over the newspaper's report that his name was on a 2003 birthday greeting for Epstein.

title: Japan PM Ishiba vows to stay on after bruising election defeat
shortDescription: The embattled prime minister said he would remain in office to oversee tariff talks with the United States and other pressing matters.

title: Trump pledged to save Afghans. But UAE had already sent some back.
shortDescription: Days before President Donald Trump said he would help Afghan evacuees who fled their country, the UAE had already begun returning them to Afghanistan.

title: Trump celebrates 6-month mark: US 'most respected country' in the world
shortDescription: Celebrating the sixth-month mark of his second term, Trump said the United States is the 'hottest' and most respected Country anywhere in the World."

title: Only 25% of Americans feel like Trump’s policies have helped them
shortDescription: According to an AP-NORC poll, only a quarter of Americans think US President Donald Trump’s policies have helped them, while 49% believe they’ve done more harm than good.

title: Trump approval rating drops in new poll; more Americans hit immigration policies
shortDescription: A new poll from CBS/YouGov says support for Trump's immigration policies have dropped by double digits since February.

title: Senator hits Trump for blaming Epstein backlash on Dems
shortDescription: Minnesota Sen. Amy Klobuchar knocked President Donald Trump for blaming Democrats over the backlash his administration faces on the Jeffrey Epstein case.

title: Trump looks to the South to grow ICE detention
shortDescription: Louisiana, long known for its 'prison economy,' now houses more ICE detention facilities than any other non-border state.

title: Trump's on a roll. Why isn't he smiling? Answer: Jeffrey Epstein
shortDescription: Overshadowed is Congress' willingness to cede a constitutional power to the White House. Instead, the case of a disgraced and dead financier looms.

title: Inside Trump's golden 'perfecto' approach to design at the White House
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has his own personal aesthetic, evident in his makeover of the White House. 'It keeps my real estate juices flowing," he said.

title: Trump EPA cuts research and development office
shortDescription: The research and development office had been in the crosshairs of organizations allied with President Donald Trump.

title: Trump sues Wall Street Journal over Epstein letter story
shortDescription: President Trump filed a $10 billion lawsuit against Rupert Murdoch and the Wall Street Journal over claims he sent Epstein a lewd birthday letter.
